landingSection.title: Scholarships for undocumented students.
landingSection.subTitle: A resource list of scholarships by and for the community.

studentTab.title: Fewer barriers, more scholarships.
studentTab.description: Browse our databse at ease, knowing none of our schoalrships require U.S. citizenship or permanent residency.

communityTab.title: Join and Support the Community
communityTab.description: Know a scholarship available for undocumented students not yet in our database? Sign up and add them, become part of our community of scholarship contributers.

about.title: For and by the undocu community.
about.description: Meet the team behind {{brand}}. We are a group of lifelong learners who are passionate about technology and community upliftment. The project arose from our own struggles as students and the lack of resources for our community.

team.josue: I am a DACA recipient currently working as a software engineer. I came up with this project idea after participating in the <1>Beyond HB 1079</1> team and noticing how painful it is to find scholarships and compile a list for undocumented students. My hope is to make this the go-to resource for scholarships for undocumented students.
team.edwin: I am a software engineer from the University of California Irvine. I enjoy learning and using my skills to make software that makes an impact in communites. Being a DACA recipient has led me to have an emotional connection with {{brand}}.
team.gonzalo: My passion for computers has lead me to pursue a career in Software Engineering. I am currently a UWB CSS student completing my final year in the Computer Science and Software Engineering program. I am 24 years old, bilingual and currently a part of the DACA program. I intend to contribute as much as possible to building a better tomorrow.
team.sergio: Iâ€™m a UX Designer that is interested in using technology as a means to solve problems. My personal experiences have inspired my focus on empathy and universal design. I find joy in the ability to explore ideas with a central aim to create solutions that will help people solve meaningful problems.
team.job: I am driven to solve problems with software; software has tremendous power to advance society. So, I would like to contribute and have an impact.
